channel.title: Secure.sbam.org
channel.description: Secure.sbam.org is a website that provides information on how to protect your computer from malware and other security threats.

item.title: New Malware Threat Discovered
item.description: A new malware threat has been discovered that can steal your personal information, including your passwords, credit card numbers, and social security number.

item.title: How to Protect Yourself from Malware
item.description: There are a number of things you can do to protect yourself from malware, including: * Install a reputable antivirus program and keep it up to date. * Be careful about what websites you visit and what files you download. * Only open emails from people you know and trust. * Keep your operating system and software up to date.
